column1: * [[Gandalf]] urges an attack on [[Dol Guldur]]. [[Saruman]] overrules him.<ref name="TA"/>
* [[Saruman]] begins to search near the [[Gladden Fields]].<ref name="TA"/>
* [[Folca]], son of Walda, becomes the thirteenth King of [[Rohan]].<ref name="Mark"/>
* Birth of [[Halfred Greenhand]], second child and first son of [[Holman the greenhanded]].<ref>{{App
